phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
These children have had their magic sucked out of them.
If left like this, they may never be able to use magic again.
How could you do something so cruel?
I guess I will just have to take care of this peon myself.
The Black Bulls are supposed to be the closest to Nean.
So why are not they responding?
But the Black Bulls are a group of misfits, are not they?
I am here to ask for backup.
I-I am not scared or anything,
but what else can I do if no one's here?
Actually, it looks like I scared off the Black Bulls, bah-ha!
I guess I will just go ask at the garden of beautiful women, the Blue Rose Knights.
So why am I wasting any more time... here?
The moon's beautiful, is not it?
I am Gordon, but you can call me Don.
You are Sekke Bronzazza from the Green Praying Mantises, right?
You are Sekke Bronzazza from the Green Praying Mantises, right?
I have not seen you since the Magic Knights' Entrance Exam...
He is going to kill me!
Would you like to join me for tea?
And I was sleeping so well...
Do you have any idea what time it is?
I apologize for coming by so late.
I have come to ask the Black Bulls for backup
Are you here about my tab at the pub?
I am from the Magic Knights
I have not been to any Magic Knights' pub.
But the town of Nean is
I just paid off my tab in Nean!
Let us just drop the tabs for a second...
You are telling me to pay them again?!
Would you like some sugar in your tea?
What the hell is wrong with this squad?!
I knew I should have asked the Blue Rose Knights!
You just do not give up.
Snow Binding Spell: Snow Lime Rock!
Stop trying to act cool in front of Marie, damn it!
This is no time to act tough!
I will take care of him myself!
Real Double is a spell that summons my other self from within the mirror world.
I would already activated the spell before you caught me.
He made snow fall over a wide area.
He has a tremendous amount of magic.
But Gauche has magic equal to his, and most importantly,
he is excellent at fighting with magic.
Though his glare and personality are the absolute worst.
There has to be some way...
Why did you do something so awful?!
How would you feel if someone did that to you?!
It does not matter to me if someone else dies or loses their magic!
This is not enough pain to make up for what you did!
You are going to pay for this, starting now!
This scum is not even worth striking with your fist.
More importantly, we have to do something about those kids.
Hey, tell us how to give them their magic back!
He is rotten to the bone.
Asta, first, undo the spell that is on the children.
As for you, do not try anything funny.
Hurry up and treat Marie's wounds, you old hag.
You do not have to tell me to do it, you sister complex punk.
Flame Recovery Magic: Sacred Healing Light.
Hey, you brats in the middle.
That way she will get better faster.
You are as kind as an angel.
The magic will work just the same wherever she stands.
Marie's not going to eat your weird food!
It is what Hage is famous for!
Asta, you grew up at the church in Hage, did not you?
Sister Lily came to our church to train once.
She told me about you then.
She was a fine young woman.
Wait, so Sister was talking about me?
That you were a small and noisy child.
After I finish this, all I have left are the windows.
Hey, you are not going to last if you work this hard from day one.
I know someone who works even harder than this.
He cannot use magic at all,
but he says he is going to be the Wizard King someday and trains every single day.
If he does not have any magic,
he probably will not even be able to join the Magic Knights.
But still, he always says, Not yet!
She said you were a hard worker with a strong heart
who would not give up in the face of adversity, and that she was very proud of you.
Looks like all of your hard work paid off.
But I have still got a long way to go!
I am going to become the Wizard King, no matter what!
I am not so sure about that.
Sister, I am never, never, never, never, ever going to give up on you, either!
Marie told me that you were the one who hit her.
The only way to atone for that is death.
My injuries are all healed now, so let him go!
I will eliminate anyone who might hurt Marie now, before they have the chance!
Asking them how to return the children's magic is more important.
These children are the future of this kingdom.
They are the three-leaf sprouts that grace this nation!
Stop your whining, you useless little brat!
Why is this happening to me?!
I thought it was a good way to make money!
Hurry up and get back here, you moron!
Took you long enough, for someone who travels with spatial magic!
They got in the way of our magic collecting!
But you get a pat on the back this time.
She is from the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
I am so happy we get to see each other again so soon!
There was an incident in Nean?
You should have mentioned that earlier, you dumbass!
But I have been saying that from the start!
You are asking me for reinforcements, but...
I have always wanted to go there once.
But now's not the time for that.
I do not know what is going through these guys' heads,
and I sure cannot be bothered, so I do not know what to tell you.
I want to save him with my curse magic...
Are these guys really Magic Knights?!
Despite how they look, Asta and Gauche are Magic Knights.
And we will be getting reinforcements from headquarters soon.
I think I will make some dinner while we wait.
I came here because you called me with the magic transmission item,
but you have not gathered that much magic yet.
Well, it is not like I care.
All of you stay right here.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun...
The terrorist group that attacked the capital?
So basically, you are the one who put Marie through all this.
Could you not interrupt our moving reunion?
While I am at it, maybe I will dissect you all!
I heard she blocked the Silver captain's attack, too!
Anti-magic is no problem at all if it cannot hit me!
but it gets refracted inside Salaman, so there is really no point.
Things might be a bit different if you have something stronger!
You look just like a normal human.
I want to know all about you!
Next, I am just going to take your pinky nail.
I will not let you have this boy!
Hey, do not get in the way.
I may be old, but I am a former Magic Knight!
I am Theresa the Crimson She-Leopard!
She is suddenly all pumped up?!
Then do you know Captain Fuegoleon?
When I served at the palace, I was his tutor.
Your enemies will not wait for you in battle.
And remain calm at all times!
He was such a snot-nosed brat, but he grew up quite well.
We will catch this one, no matter what.
Do something about this, you old hag!
What are you doing over there, you sister complex failure?
That does not look so good.
I will back you up with my mud magic.
Just fix my body so I can move.
There is a way, but are you sure?
Okay, I will do it, then.
I told you, I am sure!
Just shut up and do it!
What are you two whispering about?!
Then I will help you out.
Once I am freed and paid, I am getting the hell outta here!
Looks like I messed up a little.
He can move now, and his magic's recharged,
but looks like his personality wandered off somewhere.
It is too dangerous for you to be around that monster!
I am going to take you home for sure this time, Asta!
I managed to ask for backup, so I am going home!
But the Black Bulls' base is like a maze... Bah-ha?
It is the captain's beast room
I am going to be killed!
I just want to lead you to the exit...
Mirror, mirror on the wall, who is the cutest
No, you do not even need to answer!
I do not need a mirror to tell me that!
Black Clover, Page 33: To Help Somebody Someday.
